summary: 2003 TOYOTA HIGHLANDER - 109, 032 MILES    I WAS TOLD THAT THE ENGINE SUB-FRAME WAS ROTTED/RUSTED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED FOR SAFETY REASONS.    I WAS TOLD THE COST TO REPLACE IT WOULD BE $1,865.00.    I HAVE CONTACTED THE LOCAL TOYOTA SERVICE MANAGER TO SEE IF TOYOTA WOULD HELP OR COVER THE COST OF THE REPLACEMENT. I'M WAITING TO HEAR FROM THEM.  *TR
